mapper.insert: insert into id( unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, marker_name, marker_qualitative, marker_quantify, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{markerName}, #{markerQualitative}, #{markerQuantify}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update id set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, marker_name = #{markerName}, marker_qualitative = #{markerQualitative}, marker_quantify = #{markerQuantify}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
